paragraphs: Hey, I’m Shehroze! I’m a Full Stack Engineer based in Germany.

I specialize in crafting secure, scalable, and downright fast web applications in fast-paced startup environments. My journey from eager beginner to leading engineering teams has been fueled by a mix of grit, curiosity, and an obsession with delivering top-notch results. I thrive on tackling complex challenges, driving innovation, and turning ambitious ideas into reality.

When I’m not deep in code, you’ll find me experimenting with recipes😋, exploring the mysteries of the universe🌍, or getting lost in my favorite playlists🎧. Let’s connect and build something extraordinary together! 🚀
